verses.verse: Righteous <S%H6662><s%> art <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, when I <S%H7378>contend<s%> with <S%H1696>thee<s%>; yet would I reason the <S%H4941>cause<s%> with <S%H1870>thee<s%>: wherefore doth the way of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? wherefore are all they at <S%H7951>ease<s%> that deal <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>?

Thou hast <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H8327>them<s%>, yea, they have taken root; they <S%H3212>grow<s%>, <S%H6213>yea<s%>, they bring forth <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: thou art <S%H7138>near<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and far <S%H7350>from<s%> their <S%H3629>heart<s%>.

But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>; thou seest <S%H974>me<s%>, and triest my <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward <S%H5423>thee<s%>: pull them out like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%>, and <S%H6942>prepare<s%> them for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter<s%>.

How long shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of the whole <S%H7704>country<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%>? for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H929>therein<s%>, the beasts are <S%H5595>consumed<s%>, and the <S%H5775>birds<s%>; because they <S%H559>said<s%>, He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> our latter <S%H319>end<s%>.

If thou hast <S%H7323>run<s%> with the <S%H7273>footmen<s%>, and they have <S%H3811>wearied<s%> <S%H8474>thee<s%>, then how canst thou contend with <S%H5483>horses<s%>? and though in a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> thou art <S%H982>secure<s%>, yet how wilt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> in the pride of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>?

For even thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, even they have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H7121>thee<s%>; even they have cried <S%H4392>aloud<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H539>thee<s%>: believe them <S%H1696>not<s%>, though they speak fair words unto <S%H2896>thee<s%>.

I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>, I have <S%H5203>cast<s%> off my <S%H5159>heritage<s%>; I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dearly <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is become unto me as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>: she hath <S%H5414>uttered<s%> her voice against <S%H8130>me<s%>; therefore I have hated her.

Is my <S%H5159>heritage<s%> unto me as a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%>? are the birds of prey against her round <S%H5439>about<s%>? <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H622>ye<s%>, assemble all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H857>bring<s%> them to <S%H402>devour<s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, they have <S%H947>trodden<s%> my <S%H2513>portion<s%> under <S%H947>foot<s%>, they have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>portion<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

They have <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H8076>desolation<s%>; it <S%H56>mourneth<s%> unto <S%H8077>me<s%>, being desolate; the whole <S%H776>land<s%> is made <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, because no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>layeth<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Destroyers <S%H7703><s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon all the bare <S%H8205>heights<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H398>devoureth<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: no <S%H1320>flesh<s%> hath <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H6975>thorns<s%>; they have put themselves to <S%H2470>pain<s%>, and <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H954>nothing<s%>: and ye shall be ashamed of your <S%H8393>fruits<s%>, because of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> against all mine <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, that <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which I have caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>: <S%H5428>behold<s%>, I will pluck them up from off their <S%H127>land<s%>, and will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H310>pass<s%>, after that I have plucked them <S%H5428>up<s%>, I will <S%H7725>return<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H7725>them<s%>; and I will bring them again, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>heritage<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3925>pass<s%>, if they will diligently <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; even as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; then shall they be <S%H1129>built<s%> up in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But if they will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, then will I <S%H5428>pluck<s%> <S%H5428>up<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, plucking <S%H5428>up<s%> and destroying <S%H5002>it<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
